import pyodbc import pandas as pd import os #https://win32com.goermezer.de/microsoft/ms-office/send-email-with-outlook-and-python.html os.chdir(r'D:\SentEmail') style="" table = "\n" conn_str = ( r'DRIVER={SQL Server};' r'SERVER=NDS-AA-02;' r'DATABASE=HPU;' r'Trusted_Connection=no;' r'UID=RPA;' r'PWD=nds1@2020;' r'autocommit=True' ) cnxn = pyodbc.connect(conn_str,MARS_Connection='Yes') cur = cnxn.cursor() # cur1 = cnxn.cursor() # cur2 = cnxn.cursor() # cur3 = cnxn.cursor() USP_GetPendingSentEmails = "{ call USP_GetPendingSentEmails}" df_GetPendingSentEmails = pd.read_sql_query(sql=USP_GetPendingSentEmails, con=cnxn) for Index in df_GetPendingSentEmails.index: if len(df_GetPendingSentEmails) > 0: try: CLIENT_ID = round(int(df_GetPendingSentEmails['CLIENT_ID'][Index])) except: CLIENT_ID = df_GetPendingSentEmails['CLIENT_ID'][Index] SENT_LOG_ID = round(int(df_GetPendingSentEmails['SENT_LOG_ID'][Index])) EMAIL_TYPE = df_GetPendingSentEmails['EMAIL_TYPE'][Index] MONTH_YEAR = df_GetPendingSentEmails['MONTH_YEAR'][Index] IN_EMAIL_ID = df_GetPendingSentEmails['IN_EMAIL_ID'][Index] TO_EMAIL = df_GetPendingSentEmails['TO_EMAIL'][Index] EMAIL_ATTACHMENTS = df_GetPendingSentEmails['EMAIL_ATTACHMENTS'][Index] CREATED_DATETIME = df_GetPendingSentEmails['CREATED_DATETIME'][Index] IS_SENT_STATUS = df_GetPendingSentEmails['IS_SENT_STATUS'][Index] SENT_DATETIME = df_GetPendingSentEmails['SENT_DATETIME'][Index] # break #" SELECT * FROM [HPU].[dbo].[HPU_SETTINGS]" USP_Get_HPU_Settings = "{ call USP_Get_HPU_Settings}" df_Get_HPU_Settings = pd.read_sql_query(sql=USP_Get_HPU_Settings, con=cnxn) ADMIN_MAIL_ID = df_Get_HPU_Settings['ADMIN_MAIL_ID'][0] if EMAIL_TYPE == 'UNCLASSIFIEDCLIENTMAIL': cnxn = pyodbc.connect(conn_str) cur = cnxn.cursor() USP_GetEMailLogID ="{call USP_GetEMailLogDetails_SentEmail (?)}" params = [int(IN_EMAIL_ID)] df_USP_GetEMailLogID = pd.read_sql_query(sql=USP_GetEMailLogID, params=params, con=cnxn) if len(df_USP_GetEMailLogID) > 0: LOG_ID = int(df_USP_GetEMailLogID['ID'][0]) CLIENTID = df_USP_GetEMailLogID['CLIENTID'][0] emailSender = df_USP_GetEMailLogID['FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS'][0] EMAIL_DATE_TIME = df_USP_GetEMailLogID['EMAIL_DATE_TIME'][0] FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS = df_USP_GetEMailLogID['FROM_EMAIL_ADDRESS'][0] SUBJECT = df_USP_GetEMailLogID['SUBJECT'][0] CLIENT_IDENTIFICATION = '[NO]' #################### USP_GetEmailTypesDeatils_SentEmail = "{ call USP_GetEmailTypesDeatils_SentEmail (?) }" params = [EMAIL_TYPE] USP_GetEmailTypesDeatils_SentEmail = pd.read_sql_query(sql=USP_GetEmailTypesDeatils_SentEmail, params=params, con=cnxn) MAIL_SUBJECT = USP_GetEmailTypesDeatils_SentEmail['MAIL_SUBJECT'][0] MAIL_BODY = USP_GetEmailTypesDeatils_SentEmail['MAIL_BODY'][0] ######## fileout = open("html-table.html", "w") MAIL_SUBJECT=str(MAIL_SUBJECT) MAIL_BODY=str(MAIL_BODY) fileout.writelines("

"+MAIL_SUBJECT +"
